name: Arun Thomas Alex
title: Full Stack Developer
about:
Hi! My name is {name} and I'm a full stack developer with a total experience of {experience} years. I enjoy being challenged and engaging with projects that require me to work outside my comfort and knowledge set, as continuing to learn new languages and development techniques are important to me and the success of the organization that am work with. My key area of expertise is back end but I have an above average knowledge in the front end development as well.

I have work on both monolithic and microservice applications and was able to be part of the architect team on deciding the enhancement of the products.

experiences.description: I was able to be part of some of the crucial projects in the compant and for my work I'm recognized as the employee of the year for the last 4 consecutive year. I had the opportunity of work with architect team to identify and finalize technologies for the enhancement fo the product.
Worked as a software engineer on some of the crucial porjects parallelly, and my worked was recognized for the effort that I have put.
